discover.name: Hill Aerospace Museum
discover.address: 7961 Cottonwood Street, Building 1955, Hill AFB, UT 84056
discover.description: A large aviation and aerospace museum with indoor galleries and outdoor air-park exhibits of aircraft, missiles, and artifacts.

discover.name: Peery's Egyptian Theater
discover.description: Historic 800-seat performing arts center in downtown Ogden, hosting live theater, music, and film events.

discover.name: Ogden Union Station (Utah State Railroad Museum, etc.)
discover.description: Historic train depot housing multiple museums: railroad, firearms, western heritage, classic cars, and art galleries.

discover.name: Historic 25th Street
discover.address: 25th Street between Wall Ave & Washington Blvd, Ogden, UT
discover.description: Historic downtown street lined with shops, restaurants, galleries â€” a cultural hub and walking district.

discover.name: Waterfall Canyon Trail
discover.address: 29th Street Trailhead (approx. 2985 Buchanan Ave, Ogden, UT 84403)
discover.description: Popular ~2.4-mile round-trip hike from the 29th Street trailhead up the canyon to a ~200 ft waterfall.

discover.name: Hidden Valley Trail
discover.address: 22nd Street Trailhead (east end of 22nd St, Ogden, UT)
discover.description: Strenuous out-and-back (~4.9 mi) trail branching off Indian Trail, accessed from the 22nd Street trailhead, with great views and a 'hidden valley' section.

discover.name: Beus Canyon Trail
discover.address: Beus Canyon Trailhead, E 4600 S, Ogden, UT 84403
discover.description: Trail up Beus Canyon toward Mt. Ogden. Moderate to steep terrain; trail begins near 4600 S and climbs through scenic canyon until saddle near Mt. Ogden.

discover.name: George S. Eccles Dinosaur Park
discover.description: Outdoor sculpture park and indoor museum featuring life-size dinosaurs, paleontology exhibits, fossils, and interactive displays.
